diary.story: Today I collapsed a corruption ring led by a major gang accountant under emergency sirens. The case was protective. It ended in the badge beginning to feel deserved. Respect arrived only after consistency, not speeches. I used Questionable Detective Trench of Narrow Escapes the lawful way, and it changed the outcome.

diary.story: Today I collapsed a corruption ring led by a major gang accountant under emergency sirens. The case was protective. It ended in the badge beginning to feel deserved. Respect arrived only after consistency, not speeches. I used Questionable Detective Trench of Narrow Escapes the lawful way, and it changed the outcome.
